text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile

Item keywords:
Shake 'n Go Racers put the control of speed and power into kids hands
Just shake it up to start the "engine`"
The more you shake it up, the longer it goes
Hear cool phrases every time you let it go
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile and Mr. Freeze Racer
Goes up to 20 feet

Product description:
text.Response A:
Kids will have a blast with the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile. The more they shake it, the further it goes! Simply pick it up, give it a shake, and set it down to watch it take off. It's that easy! And the more they shake it, the faster and further it goes. Plus, it's packed with cool phrases that are sure to make kids laugh. It's the perfect gift for any child who loves Batman and the DC Super Friends.
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile, and Mr. Freeze Racer. Each one puts the power in kids' hands!
text.Response B: The more you shake it, the longer it goes! With the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile, kids put the power and speed of this super vehicle into their own hands. Just shake it up to start the "engine", then let it go! The more it's shaken, the further it can go - up to 20 feet! Kids will love the cool phrases that are heard each time it's set free. Collect all four of the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends vehicles: Batmobile, Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer and Mr. Freeze Racer. Each sold separately.

meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

535.displayed_text:
Prompt

Your client has asked you to write a product description using item keywords and item name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item name:
Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile

Item keywords:
Shake 'n Go Racers put the control of speed and power into kids hands
Just shake it up to start the "engine`"
The more you shake it up, the longer it goes
Hear cool phrases every time you let it go
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile and Mr. Freeze Racer
Goes up to 20 feet

Product description:

Response A

Kids will have a blast with the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile. The more they shake it, the further it goes! Simply pick it up, give it a shake, and set it down to watch it take off. It's that easy! And the more they shake it, the faster and further it goes. Plus, it's packed with cool phrases that are sure to make kids laugh. It's the perfect gift for any child who loves Batman and the DC Super Friends.
Collect all the Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends: Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer, Batmobile, and Mr. Freeze Racer. Each one puts the power in kids' hands!

Response B

The more you shake it, the longer it goes! With the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go! DC Super Friends Batmobile, kids put the power and speed of this super vehicle into their own hands. Just shake it up to start the "engine", then let it go! The more it's shaken, the further it can go - up to 20 feet! Kids will love the cool phrases that are heard each time it's set free. Collect all four of the Fisher-Price Shake 'n Go DC Super Friends vehicles: Batmobile, Joker Mobile, Green Lantern Racer and Mr. Freeze Racer. Each sold separately.
